Shivani Rangole Wiki | Biography | Height | Weight | Age | Boyfriend

Bolly Reporter
9 months ago

Shivani Rangole is a Marathi actress who is working on TV and movies. During her college days, she acted in many plays, which developed her interest in making a career in acting. Finally, she made her debut in the television serial Shejari Sheraji in 2013. Also, she made her debut in the film industry with the Marathi movie titled Phuntroo in 2016, as a supporting actress.

Biography & Wiki

Shivani Rangole’s nickname is Shivani. She was born on 28 October 1995 in Chinchwad, Pune, Maharashtra, India. Hence, her current age is 24 years. Shivani’s Zodiac is Scorpio.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Family Members

Shivani’s father’s name is Atul Rangole who is a mechanical engineer and her mother is Radha Rangole who is a school teacher.

Education and School, College

Shivani did her schooling from Abinav Vidyalaya. After that, Shivani has completed Graduation in Humanity from Fergusson College, Pune, Maharashtra.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

There was a buzz that Shivani Rangole has an affair with co-actor, Producer, and Entrepreneur Rohit KaduDeshmukh.

Favorite Things and Hobbies

Shivani Rangole filmography

Shivani Rangole mainly works in Marathi TV Serials, Movies & Plays. During her college days, Shivani has acted in a number of plays, which increased her interest in building her career in the acting world. Finally, she was made her on-screen debut with Marathi Movie ‘Jara Hatke‘ in 2016. Her First TV Serial ‘Bun Maksa‘ on Zee Yuva. Moreover, she worked in films like Phuntroo, Double Seat, Chintoo 2: Khajnyachi Chittarkatha & TV Serial Shejari Shejari Pakke Shejari. Shivani also worked in three plays like Anthema, Jhulta Pool, Welcome Zindagi, etc.

Awards & Recognitions

Shivani won Zee trophy for ‘Welcome Zindagi’. Also, she won Sanskruti Kala Darpan Award for Best Supporting Actress in ‘Welcome Zindagi’.

Salary and Net Worth

Shivani has a net worth of $1.5 million dollars as of 2019. Also, she is taking 30-40 lakh per movie as a salary.

Contact Address

Facts about Shivani Rangole

  • Singer-actress Ketaki Mategaonkar and Shivani are also good friends in real life.
  • Furthermore, Shivani came into the limelight after she played the role of ‘Mahua’ in her debut Marathi TV serial ‘Shejari Shejari’.
  • She was also featured in a few plays like ‘Anathema’, ‘Jhulta Pool’ and ‘Welcome Zindagi’.
